text: Hilton Kuala Lumpur is a 5-star business hotel, located at 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It is part of the hotel chain Hilton Hotels & Resorts. Hilton Kuala Lumpur is situated in the heart of the vibrant KL Sentral area, towering 35 floors and 154m height.Kuala Lumpur building The hotel is under number 43 of the tallest buildings in Malaysia.Hilton Kuala Lumpur Skyscraper Next to it is the same building that houses a hotel of the French chain Le Meridien. ==The Hotel== Hilton Kuala Lumpur has received more than 100 awards since the hotel opened in 2004. The hotel was awarded the Best Business Hotel in Kuala Lumpur at the Business Traveler Asia Pacific Awards 2012. It was also recognized as the Best City Hotel - Kuala Lumpur 2012 at the 23rd Annual TTG Travel Awards Ceremony held in Bangkok in October, the fifth time the hotel has won the award since the hotel's inception. Some other highlights include Best Hotel Malaysia at World Travel Awards 2005 in London, International Five Star Diamond Award by American Association of Hospitality Sciences Awards 2005, Best Business Hotel in Asia by TTG Asia 2005, Best Hotel Development award at the FIABCI Malaysian chapter's Malaysian Property Awards 2006, Best New Business Hotel in the World at the Business Traveler Awards United Kingdom 2006, Best Business Hotel in Kuala Lumpur by Business Traveler Asia Pacific 2006, Luxury Hotel of the Year in Hospitality Asia Platinum Awards 2007, Malaysia's Leading Business Hotel in World Travel Awards 2007, Best City Hotel by TTG Asia 2009, Asia's Leading Design Hotel by World Travel Awards 2009, Best City Hotel by Expatriate Lifestyle 2010.Hilton Kuala Lumpur’s numerous awards and nominationsMalaysia's Best Hotel Spa 2015 Nominees ==References== ==External links== * Kuala Lumpur Sentral * Hilton Kuala Lumpur Sweeps Regional Awards * TTG Travel Awards - TTG Asia Category:2004 establishments in Malaysia Category:Hotels in Kuala Lumpur Category:Hotel buildings completed in 2004
